effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Hold out the feather for 1 sec to strike with the power of the storm, crashing down on the target location and inflicting 814,333 Nature damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Conjure a Spectral Scythe, dealing 1.1 million Shadow damage to your target and 164,492 Shadow damage in a 15 yd cone to enemies behind your target. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
